gist.headline: SimpleTools joins the hive
gist.blurb: A new suite of utilities has landed in our developer showcase. SimpleTools offers citation generation, AI humanization, and text scrambling for your daily workflow.
gist.summary: Added SimpleTools, a collection of text utilities including citation generation and AI humanization, to the community apps list.
gist.impact: Users can now discover and access SimpleTools directly from the Pollinations app directory.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee at a cozy wooden workbench, organizing a set of friendly-looking pixelated tools (wrench, pencil, gear) that are interacting with floating text blocks. Represents the 'utility' nature of the new app.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot organizing a neat workbench with pixelated text tools and a citation machine. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'SIMPLE TOOLS'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
